text: The 1962 Tour de Hongrie was the 18th edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 30 June to 8 July 1962. The race started and finished in Budapest. The race was won by Adolf Christian. ==Route== {| class="wikitable" |+ Stages of the 1962 Tour de Hongrie |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Route ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" colspan="2" | Type ! scope="col" | Winner |- ! scope="col" | 1 | style="text-align:right;" | 30 June | Budapest to Győr | | alt= | Plain stage | |- ! scope="col" | 2 | style="text-align:right;" | 1 July | Győr to Szombathely | | alt= | Plain stage | |- ! scope="col" | 3 | style="text- align:right;" | 2 July | Szombathely to Veszprém | | alt= | Hilly stage | |- ! scope="col" | 4 | style="text-align:right;" | 3 July | Siófok to Pécs | | alt= | Intermediate stage | |- ! scope="col" | 5 | style="text-align:right;" | 4 July | Pécs to Szekszárd | | link= | Individual time trial | |- ! scope="col" | 6 | style="text-align:right;" | 5 July | Szekszárd to Szeged | | alt= | Plain stage | |- ! scope="col" | 7 | style="text-align:right;" | 6 July | Szeged to Debrecen | | alt= | Plain stage | |- ! scope="col" | 8 | style="text-align:right;" | 7 July | Debrecen to Miskolc | | alt= | Plain stage | |- ! scope="col" | 9 | style="text-align:right;" | 8 July | Miskolc to Budapest | | alt= | Hilly stage | |- | colspan="3" style="text-align:center" | Total | colspan="4" style="text-align:center" | '''''' |} ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | Austria | style="text- align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | Vasas | style="text- align:right;" | + 4' 02" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | BVSC | style="text-align:right;" | + 4' 43" |} |} ==References== 1962 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie
